items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.

items.content_html: Qid is a lightweight and user-friendly web clone UI focused on simplicity and usability. Its minimalist interface and responsive design make it easy for developers to create modern web projects. With added GSAP animations, Qid enhances its beauty and visual appeal, offering a polished and engaging user experience.
items.title: Iamanshuaditya/qid-web: Qid is a lightweight and user-friendly web clone UI focused on simplicity and usability. Its minimalist interface and responsive design make it easy for developers to create modern web projects. With added GSAP animations, Qid enhances its beauty and visual appeal, offering a polished and engaging user experience.
